mapper.select: select order_number, project_number, project_location, age_group, sex_group, project_name, group_number, project_time from project where project_number = #{projectNumber}
select order_number, project_number, project_location, age_group, sex_group, project_name, group_number, project_time from project
mapper.insert: insert into project ( project_number, project_location, age_group, sex_group, project_name, group_number, project_time) values ( #{projectNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ageGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
